entry.title: Meta’s Instagram Partners With Polygon In NFT Push
entry.summary: Instagram will leverage the Polygon network to allow its users to post and share NFTs.

entry.title: Terra’s UST De-Pegs by 40%, Raising Questions About Feasibility of Algorithmic Stablecoins The algorithmic stablecoin dropped below its $1 peg as the LUNA token plunged.
entry.summary: Terra’s stablecoin UST, the poster child for decentralized assets tied to the US dollar, is off its peg by the most ever as its backbone, the LUNA token, dives.

entry.title: Hop Protocol To Launch DAO and Airdrop Tokens To Early Users
entry.summary: Cross-chain bridge Hop Protocol is launching a DAO and airdropping 8% of $HOP supply to early users.

entry.title: NFT Aggregators Scale Trading as OpenSea Treads Water New Breed of NFT Platforms Crank Up the Volume
entry.summary: New Breed of NFT Platforms Crank Up the Volume

entry.title: P2E Game Illuvium Preps Auction of 20,000 Virtual Plots Founder Kieran Warwick Says Sponsors Are Poised for Esports Events
entry.summary: Founder Kieran Warwick Says Sponsors Are Poised for Esports Events
